data.message: Is it not more environmentally beneficial for a corporate super-giant to use 100% recycled plastic rather than just telling people that their bottles can be recycled?

replies.message: Hi Jasper, for the last five years we’ve been using 25% recycled plastic across all our brands, a figure we want to increase to 50% by 2020, but there’s not enough recycled plastic to go beyond that in Great Britain at the moment. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates.
